title: Action and emotional
review:
When i finds out that this movie is based on a true story, i don't believe, because a film that is based on a true story make so good i had never seen before.
Have a emotional end, and is ironic and adventurous.

title: Monster!
review: I think this film is original but not only in the way it was shot but even the idea of the this film. Its hard to make a movie only with a videocamera and this film for me succeed. For all this i give a 8

review: Interesting and very good until the first half of the film but in the second half the film become too much fantastic. Twist at the end of the film.

title: Best end!
review:
I have no comments to the end, no word. Is literally beautiful. This film even contains the most good interpreted scene of the history of the cinema.
If you have never seen this movie, you must see this.

review: The idea of change of body is excellent but this film is too much fantastic and for this movie my expectations was of one storyline more complicated.

review: This movie have a meaning Incredible. The end most beautiful that I ever seen, and an interpretation wonderful. TRULY NO WORD!!

title: Must See
review: I think this is best Western film.1 word:Original.The film is long 2.45h but it's right for this beautiful.

title: The Mist
review:
The only horror movie that i liked. Based on the beautiful book of Stephen King, The Mist is not fantastic like the book because a book is a book and a movie can't go on too much but considering that the film have a duration of 2h is good.
The only flew is the actor/res of 3rd part who interpret badly
your character

title: The best twist end
review:
The end is the best twist that I ever seen.
The movie is not a true horror, is plus splatter (and mystery).

title: One of the top movie 2003
review: Together with Mystic River for me is the 2nd best film of mystery 2003. The movie shot good and have a big twist; so brilliant
